pullrequest.title: fix Link::AddTorque for Simbody and Bullet, with test

content.raw: It's late in my time zone, so I should probably sleep on it before responding, but I think the reference point doesn't matter for application of a pure torque. The coordinate frame matters for interpreting the `x,y,z` components, and the reference point definitely matters for forces and force-moment couples, but I don't think pure torques have a reference point.
content.html: It's late in my time zone, so I should probably sleep on it before responding, but I think the reference point doesn't matter for application of a pure torque. The coordinate frame matters for interpreting the x,y,z components, and the reference point definitely matters for forces and force-moment couples, but I don't think pure torques have a reference point.
